attributes.action: make the BBC use 'The Chain' for Formula 1 now that it has won the rights to show this from 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On the 20th March 2008, it was announced that the BBC had won the rights to show Formula 1 races from 2009 for 5 years. After suffering ITV breaks etc for the last 12 years, we must ensure that the standards of the BBC's show are restored. Fleetwood Mac's The Chain is the only Theme Tune that captures the mode of Formula 1. We ask the Prime Minister to achieve something useful in his short career. Maybe they can bring Murray out of retirement now and again as well.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
